name: KripaSridhar_IT201_Project1
description:
• Feature 1: Display Mouse position
    • Input: Mouse location
    • Output: Text is displayed in the lower left corner showing X and Y of the mouse.
  • Feature 2: 3D Object On Click
    • Input: Mouse Click
    • Output: A cylinder object is created wherever the user right clicks
  • Feature 3: Color Slider 
    • Input: Slider 
    • Output: Use slider to change the color of the paint objects
  • Feature 4: Randomizing Scale
    • Input : Right click when creating 3D primitive object (cylinder)
    • Output : Randomly scaled cylinders
